title: WATCH: Hilarious reactions to SA’s favourite treats – HERITAGE
text:
There is nothing quite as satisfying as sitting back and watching foreigners enjoy our favourite South African snacks. From biltong to rusks and koeksisters, there is just something so authentic and tasty about SA’s best treats.

And since the Duchess of Sussex herself, Meghan Markle, tried samoosas this week, we thought we’d take a trip down memory lane and highlight some of the most hilarious clips we’ve seen of peeps across the oceans testing some of the best snacks that Mzansi has to offer.

From Ouma’s rusks to rock shandies, koeksisters and droëwors, these Americans were left a little perplexed after trying our delicious cuisine.

According to these Irish taste testers, South African foods require strong teeth… And honestly, we can see why!

According to YouTube sensation Brandon Farris, Lays tastes like a salad and Tex chocolate looks dehydrated… We legit never expected this response!
